Great Plains Studies.1: Integrate knowledge of the physical, social, and cultural aspects of the Plains.
Great Plains Studies.2: Integrate knowledge of the relationship between the physical environment of the Plains and its influence upon past and present Plains-dwellers.
Great Plains Studies.3: Have expertise in the effective use research tools as applied to a core discipline or research topic.
Great Plains Studies.4: Write clearly and present ideas in a cogent manner in order to have their scholarship accepted to peer-reviewed publication.
